page.title: 15FARMING:WOKINGHAM WITHOUT
page.content: Types of farming are mainly{pick {your own market gardening. }One farm is the largest Farm Market west of London with 130 acres of fruit and vegetables growing for a Pick Your Own service and a modern shop open 6 days a week selling eggs, honey, apple juice, fresh trout and frozen fish. There are two other pick your own farms and several other farms with small{dairy herds, calf and turkey {rearing. }One farm is now used as an {animal rescue centre for abandoned {pets. }Two other farms are do-it-yourself{livery stables. Another farm raises{pheasants and {partridges}to be eventually released as game birds. Chicks are widely exported.
